title: description
Nicki Minaj's Rocky Green Dragon: A little mix between the Rocky Green Dragon and the Tequini. As little as Nicki Minaj's sex.

title: notes
Nicki Minaj's Rocky Green Dragon: Gin, Cognac and a dash of mcqueen.

title: pairing
Nicki Minaj's Rocky Green Dragon: Nicki Minaj has it with a little Fruit salad and doughnut.

title: serving_suggestion
Nicki Minaj's Rocky Green Dragon: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the little sounds of Anaconda.
